news.item: From 15th March onwards, the eleven tracks of the album "You Can Choose" by The Light Panic will be available for download at all popular music shops on the internet like Musicload, Amazon and iTunes.
Our site get Design Award of NewWebPick. Thanks a lot Dima 4, who developed this site.
The Light Panic has signed the contract of debut album with German sound-recording label Major Records. Follow the news on our site and site of Major Records.
Welcome to site of The Light Panic group.
